title: race in Runtime.Submit
body:
If I compile with `-race`  using the same client call concurrently results in : 

```
==================
WARNING: DATA RACE
Write by goroutine 23:
  github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/httpkit/client.(*Runtime).Submit()
      /home/mstoykov/go/src/github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/httpkit/client/runtime.go:138 +0xc7a
  super_secret_lib/hosts.(*Client).GetHosts()
      /home/mstoykov/go/src/super_secret_lib/hosts/hosts_client.go:124 +0x3bc
// OMITTED FOR CLARITY 

Previous write by goroutine 25:
  github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/httpkit/client.(*Runtime).Submit()
      /home/mstoykov/go/src/github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/httpkit/client/runtime.go:138 +0xc7a
  super_secret_lib/hosts.(*Client).GetHosts()
      /home/mstoykov/go/src/super_secret_lib/hosts/hosts_client.go:124 +0x3bc
// OMITTED FOR CLARITY 

Goroutine 23 (running) created at:
  super_secret_app/package2.(*Application).execute()
      /home/mstoykov/go/src/super_secret_app/handlers.go:116 +0x3b5

Goroutine 25 (running) created at:
  super_secret_app/package2.(*Application).execute()
      /home/mstoykov/go/src/super_secret_app/handlers.go:116 +0x3b5
==================
```

the line in question is 

``` go
138         r.client.Transport = r.Transport
```

Where the Transport of the client is being reset on each call to the API. 
I suppose it's so that the Transport can be changed? If this is so I propose unexporting Transport and using RWMutex with a Setter.
